nodes.text: The Sy-Y  was a secret hyperspace route between the spice-producing world of Ylesia and the spice-smuggling world of Syvris. It was used by the Besadii kajidic to quickly move spice from its Ylesia factories into galactic distribution.
The Sy-Y began at Ylesia and ended at Syvris. It intersected the Shag Pabol at Ylesia, and the Hollastin Run and the Triellus Trade Route at Syvris.
